title: All Keys Lost

body.body: Always store spare keys and the key number tag in a safe place away from the motorcycle.
At least one paired key is required to start any key pairing operations. If all keys have been lost, it will not possible to pair any replacement keys.
In this situation the keyless ECM and all keys must be replaced.
If the tag bearing the key number is also lost, the lock set (fuel tank cap, seat lock etc.) must also be replaced.
Replacement Keyless ECM PB1; PJ1; PJZ; PM1; PR1; PRB; PRC; PS1; PSB; PSC; PWC; PX1; PXB; PXC; PY1; PYB; PYC
For details of the replacement keyless ECM setup process, refer to the
Setup Flow Chart - Replacement Keys and Keyless ECM - Models with an Electronic Steering Lock Fitted

metadata.ModelsTaxonomyLink: PWC; PYB; PXB; PSB; PRB; PJZ; PYC; PXC; PSC; PRC; PY1; PX1; PS1; PR1; PM1; PJ1; PB1
